imdb.plot outline: The serial is a family drama and shows the ordeals taking place in the family. The story revolves around the women head of the family. She has four sons and first three of them get married and stay in the joint family with the mother, who is the head of the family. Fourth son loves a girl and she has a younger sister and brother. Since the lady did not like the girl who is the wife of the fourth son, when she is sick and in coma stage, the girl enters the house without the sick lady noticing it. The rest of the story is about the fights and arguments caused after the regains conscious. The serial is interesting because of the brilliant screen play. The story is woven in a way that it makes the audience watch it with excitement and the soap has right mix of suspense too.
imdb.title: Thodi Kadallu
plot: The serial is a family drama and shows the ordeals taking place in the family. The story revolves around the women head of the family. She has four sons and first three of them get married and stay in the joint family with the mother, who is the head of the family. Fourth son loves a girl and she has a younger sister and brother. Since the lady did not like the girl who is the wife of the fourth son, when she is sick and in coma stage, the girl enters the house without the sick lady noticing it. The rest of the story is about the fights and arguments caused after the regains conscious. The serial is interesting because of the brilliant screen play. The story is woven in a way that it makes the audience watch it with excitement and the soap has right mix of suspense too.::Cherrie
